directions: Stir the lightly beaten egg whites, evaporated milk, sugar, and light butter together in a saucepan over medium heat until thickened and bubbly, 10 to 12 minutes.
Fold the coconut and walnuts into the thickened mixture. Set aside to cool completely before using.
ingredients: 1 (12 fluid ounce) can fat-free evaporated milk
title: German Chocolate Frosting with Walnuts
